item.text: Jesus said to his disciples, “Stumbling blocks are sure to come, but woe to the one through whom they come!

It would be <st data-num="3081" class="">better</st> for <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> to have a <st data-num="3037" class="">millstone</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4029" class="">tied</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">around</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5137" class="">neck</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> be <st data-num="4496" class="">thrown</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="2281" class="">sea</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">than</st> for <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> to <st data-num="4624" class="">cause</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> of <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="3398">little ones</st> <st data-num="4624">to sin</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="4337" class="">Watch</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1438" class="">yourselves</st>! <st data-num="1437" class="">If</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="264" class="">sins</st>, <st data-num="2008" class="">rebuke</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>. <st data-num="1437" class="">If</st><n id="4" /> he <st data-num="3340" class="">repents</st>, <st data-num="863" class="">forgive</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.
Even if he sins against you seven times in a day, and seven times returns to you saying, ‘I repent,’ you must forgive him.”
The apostles said to the Lord, “Increase our faith!”
So the Lord replied, “If you had faith the size of a mustard seed, you could say to this black mulberry tree, ‘Be pulled out by the roots and planted in the sea,’ and it would obey you.
“Would any one of you say to your slave who comes in from the field after plowing or shepherding sheep, ‘Come at once and sit down for a meal’?

<st data-num="3780">Won’t</st><n id="1" /> the master<n id="2" /> <st data-num="235" class="">instead</st> <st data-num="3004">say</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, ‘<st data-num="2090">Get</st> my <st data-num="1172" class="">dinner</st> <st data-num="2090">ready</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4024" class="">make</st> yourself <st data-num="4024" class="">ready</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="1247" class="">serve</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2193" class="">while</st><n id="4" /> I <st data-num="2068">eat</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4095" class="">drink</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> may <st data-num="2068">eat</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4095" class="">drink’</st>?

He <st data-num="3361">won’t</st> <st data-num="2192 5485">thank</st> the <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> he <st data-num="4160" class="">did</st> what he was <st data-num="1299" class="">told</st>,<n id="1" /> will he?<n id="2" />
So you too, when you have done everything you were commanded to do, should say, ‘We are slaves undeserving of special praise; we have only done what was our duty.’”
Now on the way to Jerusalem, Jesus was passing along between Samaria and Galilee.

As<n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> was <st data-num="1525" class="">entering</st><n id="2" /> a <st data-num="2968" class="">village</st>, <st data-num="1176" class="">ten</st> <st data-num="435" class="">men</st> with <st data-num="3015" class="">leprosy</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="528" class="">met</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>. <st data-num="3739" class="">They</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2476">stood</st> at a <st data-num="4207" class="">distance</st>,

<st data-num="142" class="">raised</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voices</st> and <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="2424">Jesus</st>, <st data-num="1988" class="">Master</st>, <st data-num="1653">have mercy</st><n id="1" /> on <st data-num="1473">us</st>.”

When<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> he <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="4198">Go</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="1925" class="">show</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">yourselves</st> to the <st data-num="2409" class="">priests</st>.”<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">as</st> <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> <st data-num="5217">went along</st>, <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> were <st data-num="2511" class="">cleansed</st>.

Then <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, when he <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> he was <st data-num="2390" class="">healed</st>, <st data-num="5290">turned back</st>, <st data-num="1392" class="">praising</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> a <st data-num="3173" class="">loud</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st>.

He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4098" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">with</st> his <st data-num="4383" class="">face</st> to the ground<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3844" class="">at</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus’</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st> and <st data-num="2168" class="">thanked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<n id="3" /> (<st data-num="2532">Now</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> a <st data-num="4541" class="">Samaritan.)</st><n id="5" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st>,<n id="2" /> “Were<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1176" class="">ten</st> <st data-num="2511" class="">cleansed</st>? <st data-num="4226" class="">Where</st> are the other<n id="4" /> <st data-num="1767" class="">nine</st>?

Was <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> one <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> to <st data-num="5290">turn back</st> and <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">praise</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1508">except</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="241" class="">foreigner</st>?”<n id="1" />
Then he said to the man, “Get up and go your way. Your faith has made you well.”
Now at one point the Pharisees asked Jesus when the kingdom of God was coming, so he answered, “The kingdom of God is not coming with signs to be observed,
nor will they say, ‘Look, here it is!’ or ‘There!’ For indeed, the kingdom of God is in your midst.”
Then he said to the disciples, “The days are coming when you will desire to see one of the days of the Son of Man, and you will not see it.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st> people<n id="1" /> will <st data-num="3004">say</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, ‘<st data-num="2400">Look</st>, <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st> he is!’<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3366" class="">or</st> ‘<st data-num="2400">Look</st>, <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st> he is!’ Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="565">go out</st> <st data-num="3366" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1377" class="">chase after</st> them.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="5618">just like</st> the <st data-num="796" class="">lightning</st> <st data-num="797" class="">flashes</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="2989">lights up</st> the <st data-num="3772" class="">sky</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">from</st> one side <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="3772" class="">other</st>, <st data-num="3779" class="">so</st> will the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st> <st data-num="1510">be</st> <st data-num="1722">in</st> <st data-num="846">his</st> <st data-num="2250">day</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4413">first</st> he <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3958" class="">suffer</st> <st data-num="4183">many things</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> be <st data-num="593" class="">rejected</st> <st data-num="575" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1074" class="">generation</st>.

<st data-num="2531">Just<n id="1" /> as</st> it <st data-num="1096" class="">was</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> of <st data-num="3575" class="">Noah</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3779" class="">so</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st> it will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> of the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st>.

People<n id="1" /> were <st data-num="2068" class="">eating</st>,<n id="2" /> they were <st data-num="4095" class="">drinking</st>, they were <st data-num="1060" class="">marrying</st>, they were being <st data-num="1061">given in marriage</st>—<st data-num="891">right up to</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> <st data-num="3575" class="">Noah</st> <st data-num="1525" class="">entered</st> the <st data-num="2787" class="">ark</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="2627" class="">flood</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="622" class="">destroyed</st> them <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="3668" class="">Likewise</st>, <st data-num="2531">just as</st> it <st data-num="1096" class="">was</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> of <st data-num="3091" class="">Lot</st>, people<n id="2" /> were <st data-num="2068" class="">eating</st>, <st data-num="4095" class="">drinking</st>, <st data-num="59" class="">buying</st>, <st data-num="4453" class="">selling</st>, <st data-num="5452" class="">planting</st>, <st data-num="3618" class="">building;</st>

<st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> on the <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> <st data-num="3091" class="">Lot</st> <st data-num="1831">went out</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="4670" class="">Sodom</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4442" class="">fire</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2303" class="">sulfur</st> <st data-num="1026">rained down</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="622" class="">destroyed</st> them <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st>.<n id="2" />

It will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> the <st data-num="846">same</st> on the <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st> is <st data-num="601" class="">revealed</st>.

<st data-num="1722">On</st> <st data-num="1565">that</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st>, anyone <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1510">is</st> <st data-num="1909">on</st> the <st data-num="1430">roof</st>,<n id="1" /> with <st data-num="846">his</st> <st data-num="4632">goods</st> <st data-num="1722">in</st> the <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st>, <st data-num="1994">must</st> <st data-num="3361">not</st> come <st data-num="2597" class="">down</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="142" class="">take</st> <st data-num="846">them</st> <st data-num="142" class="">away</st>, <st data-num="2532">and</st> <st data-num="3668">likewise</st> the person <st data-num="1722">in</st> the <st data-num="68">field</st> <st data-num="1994">must</st> <st data-num="3361">not</st> <st data-num="1994">turn</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">back</st>.
<st data-num="3421">Remember</st> <st data-num="3091">Lot’s</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">wife</st>!<n id="1" />

<st data-num="3739" class="">Whoever</st> <st data-num="2212" class="">tries</st> to <st data-num="4046" class="">keep</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">life</st><n id="2" /> will <st data-num="622" class="">lose</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whoever</st> <st data-num="622" class="">loses</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2225">life</st> will <st data-num="2225" class="">preserve</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>.

I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, in <st data-num="3778" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3571" class="">night</st> there will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> people <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="2825" class="">bed;</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> will be <st data-num="3880" class="">taken</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2087" class="">other</st> <st data-num="863" class="">left</st>.<n id="1" />
There will be two women grinding grain together; one will be taken and the other left.”
Then the disciples said to him, “Where, Lord?” He replied to them, “Where the dead body is, there the vultures will gather.”
